mdRecord.dcterms:title: Victoria Street Shopping Plaza, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This is a modern structure completed to replace prior buildings that were constructed in the 1960s. The structure, during the time it was photographed, had brown-tinted glass that was meant to be solar efficient. The building is part of a shopping plaza that holds stores and restaurants. [work]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Architecture and City Planning
shopping malls
glass (material)
ashlar
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Victoria Street, London, Greater London, England, United Kingdom
